Interface ApplicationConfig

  • All Superinterfaces:

public interface ApplicationConfig
extends org.aeonbits.owner.Config

        @DefaultValue("500")
@Key("queue.read.pause.length")
int queuePauseLength()
        Defines the time to pause during polling of a queue a range between 100 - 500 can speed up the application a higher range than 500ms saves cpu
        Returns:
        The length of pause in ms
